backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining a single public query function 'greet' that takes a name parameter and returns a greeting string.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the Contact Us button implementation in App.tsx with mailto link to viitjeetec@gmail.com, marked as high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of frontend files describing the main App component, global styles with OKLCH colors, Tailwind config, and React Query hooks.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles with CSS custom properties defining OKLCH color tokens for light and dark themes using neutral grayscale values.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the viitjee application with root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component rendering the viitjee educational platform landing page with header navigation, hero section, features, courses, about section, and footer including mailto links to viitjeetec@gmail.com.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook managing ICP backend actor creation with Internet Identity authentication, invalidating dependent queries when actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity storage, and AuthClient lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hook 'useGreeting' that fetches a greeting from the backend actor using the provided name parameter.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles with OKLCH color system using warm orange primary colors for light and dark modes, plus typography and font settings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React application entry point setting up QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and rendering the App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme with OKLCH color tokens, custom border radius, shadows, Inter font family, and accordion animations.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file for "viitjee" educational app by Venkatesh, documenting 15 existing features (branding, landing page, visual theme, course/quiz functionality, contact form) and 2 known issues (build timeouts, mailto link not working). Currently marked as a fix request with architectural notes about React frontend, Motoko backend, and ICP deployment.
